mapper.update: update yc_group set group_name = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_city = #{groupCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_introduction = #{groupIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_leader = #{groupLeader,jdbcType=BIGINT}, group_requirement = #{groupRequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_image = #{groupImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, group_status = #{groupStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, group_qq = #{groupQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select group_id, group_name, group_city, group_introduction, group_leader, group_requirement, group_image, create_time, group_status, group_qq from yc_group where group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select group_id, group_name, group_city, group_introduction, group_leader, group_requirement, group_image, create_time, group_status, group_qq from yc_group
select * from yc_group order by create_time desc limit 0,3
